title: Full Stack Web Developer Intern
description:
**Full Stack Web Developer Intern (Paid)** 




**Company:** 
 Dexter's Tech
 **Location:** 
 Remote
 **Duration:** 
 3 Months
 **Application Deadline:** 
 29th December 2025
 **Opportunity:** 
 Potential full\\-time role based on performance \\+ Internship Certificate
 



**About Dexter's Tech** 
 Dexter's Tech provides students and graduates with practical learning opportunities, hands\\-on experience, and career growth in
 **full\\-stack web development** 
 through real\\-world, industry\\-oriented projects.
 



**Role Overview** 
 As a
 **Full Stack Web Developer Intern** 
 , you'll work on live projects while gaining hands\\-on experience in both
 **front\\-end** 
 and
 **back\\-end** 
 development. This internship will enhance your technical skills and prepare you for a professional career in web development.
 



**Responsibilities** 



* Design, code, and modify websites for functionality, performance, and visual appeal.
* Develop responsive and dynamic web pages and applications.
* Test, debug, and optimize code to ensure a seamless user experience.
* Work with modern full\\-stack development tools and frameworks.
* Collaborate with senior developers and teams on real\\-world assignments.



**Requirements** 



* Currently enrolled in or recently graduated from a relevant degree/program.
* Proficiency in
 **HTML, CSS, and JavaScript** 
 .
* Familiarity with frameworks such as
 **React, Angular, Node.js, or Express.js** 
 (preferred).
* Strong communication, problem\\-solving, and teamwork skills.
* Passion for full\\-stack development and a desire to learn new technologies.



**Benefits** 



* **Stipend:** 
 ₹7,500 \\- ₹15,000 (Performance\\-Based) (Paid)
* Hands\\-on experience working on real\\-world full\\-stack development projects.
* **Certificate of Internship** 
 \\&
 **Letter of Recommendation** 
 upon completion.
* Build a strong professional portfolio through practical project work.



**Equal Opportunity Statement** 
 Dexter's Tech is an equal\\-opportunity employer and encourages applicants from all backgrounds to apply.
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting, IT System Training and Support, and E-Learning Providers

title: Software Engineer Data Science-Remote
description:
Hiring a Data Scientist
   

  

**Hiring a Data Scientist** 
 to help build advanced analytics and data\\-driven infrastructure for its AI lab partner focused on developing intelligent agent\\-based systems. This role is ideal for analytical thinkers who excel at turning large\\-scale data into actionable insights and enjoy working at the intersection of machine learning, experimentation, and real\\-world applications. Youll be designing data pipelines, statistical models, and performance metrics that drive the next generation of autonomous systems.
   

  

**You're a Great Fit If You**
* Have a strong background in data science, machine learning, or applied statistics.
* Are proficient in Python, SQL, and familiar with libraries such as Pandas, NumPy, Scikit\\-learn, and PyTorch/TensorFlow.
* Understand probabilistic modeling, statistical inference, and experimentation frameworks (A/B testing, causal inference).
* Can collect, clean, and transform complex datasets into structured formats ready for modeling and analysis.
* Have experience designing and evaluating predictive models, using metrics like precision, recall, F1\\-score, and ROC\\-AUC.
* Are comfortable working with large\\-scale data systems (Snowflake, BigQuery, or similar).
* Are curious about AI agents, and how data can shape the reasoning, adaptability, and behavior of intelligent systems.
* Enjoy collaborating with cross\\-functional teams  from engineers to research scientists  to define meaningful KPIs and experiment setups.


 Primary Goal of This Role
   

  

 To design and implement robust data models, pipelines, and metrics that support experimentation, benchmarking, and continuous learning for agentic AI systems. The role focuses on building data\\-driven insights into how agents reason, perform, and improve over time across algorithmic and real\\-world tasks.
   

  

 What Youll Do
   

  

* Develop data collection and preprocessing pipelines for structured and unstructured data from multiple agent simulations.
* Build and iterate on machine learning models for performance prediction, behavior clustering, and outcome optimization.
* Design and maintain dashboards and visualization tools for monitoring agent performance, benchmarks, and trends.
* Conduct statistical analyses to evaluate the efficacy of AI systems under various environments and constraints.
* Collaborate with engineers to design evaluation frameworks that measure reasoning quality, adaptability, and efficiency.
* Prototype data\\-driven tools and feedback loops to automatically improve model accuracy and agent behavior over time.
* Work closely with AI research teams to translate experimental results into scalable, production\\-grade insights.


 Why This Role Is Exciting
   

  

* Work at the forefront of AI agent intelligence and help define how data shapes their evolution.
* Blend machine learning, experimentation, and data engineering in one role.
* Collaborate with top\\-tier AI engineers on new agent benchmarks and feedback mechanisms.
* Contribute to a mission that merges algorithmic reasoning, real\\-world performance, and human\\-like decision\\-making.


 Pay \\& Work Structure
   

  

* Youll be classified as an hourly contractor.
* Paid weekly via Stripe Connect, based on hours logged.
* Part\\-time (20 hrs \\- 40 hrs/week) with fully remote, async flexibility  work from anywhere, on your own schedule.
* Weekly bonus of $500 \\- $1000 USD per 5 task created.


**Skills**
* Quantitative Analytics
* NumPy
* PyTorch
* Machine Learning
* Pandas
* TensorFlow
* Scikit\\-Learn
* Python
* Artificial Intelligence (AI)
* Data Science


 Skills: python,data science,machine learning,engineers,pytorch,tensorflow,sql,panda,numpy

title: Backend tech lead
description:
We are looking for an experienced Backend Tech Lead to join our growing engineering team and lead the design and development of scalable backend systems.
   

  

 Experience
   

 4\\+ years of backend development experience
   

 Strong hands\\-on \\+ leadership exposure
   

  

 Compensation
   

 ₹30LPA
   

  

 Role \\& Responsibilities
   

 Lead the design, development, and architecture of backend systems using Python
   

 Build and maintain scalable APIs using Django / FastAPI
   

 Take ownership of technical decisions, code quality, and best practices
   

 Mentor team members, conduct code reviews, and drive technical excellence
   

 Work closely with product and cross\\-functional teams to deliver features
   

 Design and optimize relational database schemas and queries
   

 Ensure performance, reliability, and scalability of applications
   

 Integrate NoSQL databases (MongoDB) where required
   

 Work with message brokers like RabbitMQ / ZeroMQ / IBM\\-MQ
   

  

 Required Skills
   

 Strong expertise in Python
   

 No\\-SQL Database Knowledge, familiarity with No\\-SQL
   

 Hands\\-on experience with Django \\& FastAPI
   

 Solid understanding of relational databases \\& SQL
   

 Extensive Experience with API design and development
   

 Familiarity with MongoDB
   

 Experience with message broker systems like RabbitMQ, ZeroMQ, or IBM\\-MQ
   

 Excellent problem\\-solving and communication skills
   

 Prior experience leading or mentoring developers is a plus

title: Adobe Workfront Administrator
description:
****About The Role:****
**Grade Level (for internal use):**
 09
   

  

****About The Role:****
 We are seeking an experienced Adobe Workfront Administrator to own and evolve our global work management platform at S\\&P Global. This position supports our in\\-house Creative Agency (The 199\\) and involves driving governance, integrations, data quality, and user adoption across Marketing, Creative, and cross\\-functional teams.
   

  

****Responsibilities And Impact:****
* Platform Ownership \\& Governance:
+ Architect and maintain Workfront portfolios, programs, projects, request queues, routing rules, custom forms/fields, templates, and blueprints.
+ Define governance (naming, taxonomy, statuses, approval flows), enforce standards, and manage license strategy.

* User \\& Access Management:
+ Manage groups, teams, roles, and permissions; administer SSO/SCIM; ensure audit, security, and compliance.

* Reporting, Dashboards \\& Data Quality:
+ Build advanced reports, dashboards, and calculated fields for capacity, throughput, time tracking, SLAs, and OKRs.
+ Monitor data hygiene, conduct periodic audits, and drive corrective actions.

* Integrations \\& Automation:
+ Lead integrations via Workfront Fusion and APIs (e.g., AEM, Marketo Engage/Adobe, Jira, Salesforce, Slack/Teams, SharePoint).
+ Design automation to reduce manual work and improve cycle times.

* Release \\& Change Management:
+ Own sandbox strategy, UAT, release notes, and change logs; run pilots and phased rollouts.
+ Create enablement assets (how\\-tos, SOPs, videos) and deliver office hours and training.

* Support \\& Continuous Improvement:
+ Run the Workfront help desk/backlog, triage tickets, and meet SLAs.
+ Track adoption/ROI metrics; surface insights and roadmap recommendations to leadership.

* Risk, Reliability \\& Vendor Liaison:
+ Proactively manage incidents, escalations, and platform reliability; partner with Adobe Support as needed.


**Compensation/Benefits Information:** 
 (This section is only applicable to US candidates)
   

  

 S\\&P Global states that the anticipated base salary range for this position is $53,094 to $95,087\\.75\\. Final base salary for this role will be based on the individual’s geographic location, as well as experience level, skill set, training, licenses and certifications.
   

  

 In addition to base compensation, this role is eligible for an annual incentive plan.
   

  

 This role is eligible to receive additional S\\&P Global benefits. For more information on the benefits we provide to our employees, please click here.
   

  

****What We’re Looking For:****
**Basic Required Qualifications:**
* 5\\+ years of hands\\-on Adobe Workfront administration at Adobe or within a large enterprise using Workfront.
* Proven experience configuring complex request\\-to\\-delivery workflows, custom forms, templates, reports, and permissions at scale.
* Practical expertise with Workfront Fusion (or comparable iPaaS) and familiarity with REST APIs.
* Background supporting marketing/creative operations or PMO in a B2B environment.
* Strong stakeholder management, documentation, training, and problem\\-solving skills.
* Bachelor’s degree or equivalent professional experience.


****Additional Preferred Qualifications:****
* Administration experience with Adobe Experience Cloud (e.g., AEM Sites/Assets, Adobe Real\\-Time CDP, Marketo Engage).
* Admin experience with work management tools like Monday.com, Jira, Smartsheet, or ServiceNow.


**What’s In It For** 
**You?**
****Our Mission:****
 Advancing Essential Intelligence.
   

  

****Our People:****
 We're more than 35,000 strong worldwide—so we're able to understand nuances while having a broad perspective. Our team is driven by curiosity and a shared belief that Essential Intelligence can help build a more prosperous future for us all.From finding new ways to measure sustainability to analyzing energy transition across the supply chain to building workflow solutions that make it easy to tap into insight and apply it. We are changing the way people see things and empowering them to make an impact on the world we live in. We’re committed to a more equitable future and to helping our customers find new, sustainable ways of doing business. Join us and help create the critical insights that truly make a difference.
   

  

****Our Values:****
**Integrity, Discovery, Partnership**
 Throughout our history, the world's leading organizations have relied on us for the Essential Intelligence they need to make confident decisions about the road ahead. We start with a foundation of integrity in all we do, bring a spirit of discovery to our work, and collaborate in close partnership with each other and our customers to achieve shared goals.
   

  

****Benefits:****
 We take care of you, so you can take care of business. We care about our people. That’s why we provide everything you—and your career—need to thrive at S\\&P Global.
   

  

**Our Benefits Include:**
* Health \\& Wellness: Health care coverage designed for the mind and body.
* Flexible Downtime: Generous time off helps keep you energized for your time on.
* Continuous Learning: Access a wealth of resources to grow your career and learn valuable new skills.
* Invest in Your Future: Secure your financial future through competitive pay, retirement planning, a continuing education program with a company\\-matched student loan contribution, and financial wellness programs.
* Family Friendly Perks: It’s not just about you. S\\&P Global has perks for your partners and little ones, too, with some best\\-in class benefits for families.
* Beyond the Basics: From retail discounts to referral incentive awards—small perks can make a big difference.


 For more information on benefits by country visit: https://spgbenefits.com/benefit\\-summaries
   

  

****Global Hiring And Opportunity At S\\&P Global:****
 At S\\&P Global, we are committed to fostering a connected and engaged workplace where all individuals have access to opportunities based on their skills, experience, and contributions. Our hiring practices emphasize fairness, transparency, and merit, ensuring that we attract and retain top talent. By valuing different perspectives and promoting a culture of respect and collaboration, we drive innovation and power global markets.
   

  

****Recruitment Fraud Alert:****
 If you receive an email from a spglobalind.com domain or any other regionally based domains, it is a scam and should be reported to reportfraud@spglobal.com. S\\&P Global never requires any candidate to pay money for job applications, interviews, offer letters, “pre\\-employment training” or for equipment/delivery of equipment. Stay informed and protect yourself from recruitment fraud by reviewing our guidelines, fraudulent domains, and how to report suspicious activity here.
   

  

**Equal Opportunity Employer**
 S\\&P Global is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race/ethnicity, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, marital status, military veteran status, unemployment status, or any other status protected by law. Only electronic job submissions will be considered for employment.
   

  

 If you need an accommodation during the application process due to a disability, please send an email to: EEO.Compliance@spglobal.com and your request will be forwarded to the appropriate person.
   

  

**US Candidates Only:** 
 The EEO is the Law Poster http://www.dol.gov/ofccp/regs/compliance/posters/pdf/eeopost.pdf describes discrimination protections under federal law. Pay Transparency Nondiscrimination Provision \\- https://www.dol.gov/sites/dolgov/files/ofccp/pdf/pay\\-transp\\_%20English\\_formattedESQA508c.pdf
   

  

 20 \\- Professional (EEO\\-2 Job Categories\\-United States of America), MRKTNG202\\.1 \\- Middle Professional Tier I (EEO Job Group)
   

  

**Job ID:** 
 322623
   

  

**Posted On:** 
 2025\\-12\\-28
   

  

**Location:** 
 Gurugram, Haryana, India
